Description:
Stunning 4 Bedroom Family Home!
This stunning family home is located in the Kallo estate. Comprising of 4 large bedrooms (ensuite to main) with open plan kitchen, meals and family, separate lounge/theatre and an alfresco entertaining area with low maintenance gardens.
With easy access to the Hume Freeway and close to the Donnybrook train station, this home is surrounded with endless parkland, and sporting ovals, the Kalkallo hotel & the upcoming major retail centre is being planned for the area, amongst them childcare, schools and tertiary facilities.
This home will provide everything you need at your fingertip.
Featuring:
- 4 bedrooms with BIR's - (ensuite to main)
- Alfresco entertaining area
- Double garage (remote and internal access)
- Front and rear landscaping
- Spacious walk in pantry
- Stone benchtop
- 900mm stainless steel appliances
- Gas ducted heating
- Down lights throughout
This is an opportunity not to be missed so act now and inspect now
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
219-221 High Street Thomastown
767 High Street Epping
952-954 High Street Reservoir

Description:
SOLD BY KALLEY SINGH & SUNIL KUMAR
MODERN HOME IN GREAT LOCATION
Inspections are a must on this fantastic four bedroom and separate lounge, modern home located in one of Kalkallos newest Kalkallo estate.
The property comprises 4 bedrooms with Spacious master with ensuite and WIR, 2 great sized bedrooms and separate study room with plenty of storage and cupboard space.
Open plan kitchen meals area for entertaining family, featuring European stainless-steel dishwasher, gas stove and ample cupboard and storage space. Bright central bathroom with shower and bath.
Property features: low maintenance backyard, alarm system, plenty of space to entertain family and friends, ducted heating and cooling throughout and remote double garage.
Located in the heart of Kalkallo within the proximity of parks and 3 minutes drive to donnybrook VLINE train station.
Call Kalley Singh - 0433 927 573 or Sunil Kumar today - 0402 487 830.

Description:
Quality Living At Its Finest At Only 1 Y.O approx.
Are you looking to buy a large family home that is in near new condition and less than one year of age?
Built by one of Australia's most reputable builders Metricon Homes , This home offers a versatile floor plan for the growing family.
On offer is a well presented, light filled residence is located in the sought after Kallo estate. Within only minutes you're driving on the Hume freeway with much less traffic to get you to the city and surrounding areas even quicker than ever before.
The functional floor plan provides loads of room for the growing family, with three spacious bedrooms and two living areas or four bedrooms and one large living domain, the choice is yours.
The main bedroom includes walk in robe & en-suite, enjoy two large living areas, a large bathroom with bathtub and sunlight, a stunning kitchen equipped
With s/s appliances, 900ml cook top , dishwasher and a walk in pantry, all overlooking a large dining and living domain plus stunning manicured gardens and a lovely
decked outdoor area.
Other features include: Ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, quality
Wooden floors, downlights, window furnishings with fly screens and plantation shutters, a large
separate laundry with outdoor access and 4 car accommodation with 2 car remote lock up
garage, two private access points from the garage to the home & the courtyard plus so much more to mention.
Your inspection is required to truly appreciate this wonderful family home.

Description:
Cloverton's Calling all Buyers
First Home Buyers and Investors, we have a superb north facing home on offer in the vibrant new community of Kalkallo, proudly nestled in the Cloverton Estate. Offering a contemporary and functional floor plan, this 3 bedroom Simonds home offers a private Master bedroom with WIR and spacious ensuite amenity. A generous laundry is a bonus many new homes lack and it opens up to a comfortable, light filled living area that features a combined lounge, meals and impressive kitchen - featuring dual stone benches, walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances and a 900mm free standing chefs oven, with the perfect vantage point when entertaining and watching the family out in the yard.
Security is accommodated via direct garage access and a multi camera alarm system, comforted with ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Located 30km from the CBD, the Cloverton Estate boasts convenient access to the Donnybrook Train Station, Hume Fwy, Craigieburn Central and many establishing schools, playgrounds, shops and walking tracks for a healthy and fulfilling daily routine.
Don't let this opportunity pass, as the area is developing fast!

Description:
The Best of Living Opportunity!
An amazing opportunity for first home buyers and investors to get into the market with a stylish HOUSE in the growing area of Kalkallo. According to CoreLogic, with a capital gain of 22.06% for the last 12 months, Kalkallo, 3064 has performed for property investments than its average annual 22.06% property growth over the last 5 years.
Perfect in its location, this beautiful brand new home will surely tick all your boxes.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with WIR and full ensuite, other 2 bedrooms with BIR and serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet)
- KITCHEN: Open plan living/dining/kitchen with 40 mm Caesar benchtops, gas cooktop, 900 mm Stainless steel appliances, double sink, oven and range hood, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
- LIVING: 2 Living areas (Formal lounge and family living)
- HEAT/COOL: Evaporative cooling and Ducted heating.
- LAUNDRY: Generous size laundry with Caesarstone benchtops.
- PARKING: Single car garage with remote control.
- BACKYARD: Low maintenance backyard.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Laminated floorboards, high ceilings, LED downlights, dliding doors to wardrobes, tiles to the ceiling in the bathrooms, video intercom, alarm system and much more…
- LOCATION: Walking distance to future parks, sports ground, future private school, future state primary school, future retail centre, proposed hospital, future city centre, minutes’ drive to future train station, Hume Freeway, Donnybrook Road, service station, restaurants and café.
- BENEFITS: First home owners grant and stamp duty savings
(Subject to Govt. policy)
SEALED BID DATE: 11TH FEBRUARY 2019 @ 7.00PM
Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity! Call Achal Arora – 0432 413 929.

Description:
Porter Davis Built, Brand New Home
Call Varun To Book An Inspection On 0488 049 926
Please use iphone maps or https://www.whereis.com/ to navigate to the property
Porter Davis home - Stamp Duty saver with luxury Design!!! $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
All you need is 5% deposit to secure the property and balance to be paid at Settlement.
115 Moxham Drive, Kalkallo is built by reputed Builder Porter Davis in the sought after Cloverton Estate. Cloverton will become the centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
This Porter Davis home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, high ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all part of the inclusion list.
Property offers:
- 3 Bedroom, master with ensuite and walk in robe, other two Bedrooms with built in robe serviced by central bathroom and a separate Water Closet.
- Modern open plan kitchen
- Open plan living area
- 20mm Stone Benchtop
- 900mm Quality Stainless Steel Cooktop and range-hood
- High ceiling 2590mm
- Remote controlled double garage & much more!!
You can purchase a brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed.
Please contact Hemant on 0447 064 664 or VK Bhanot on 0488 049 926.

Description:
Contemporary Living Less Than 1 YO
An exciting opportunity to buy a large family home that is in near new condition and less than one year of age. Built by Porter Davis, you will find the quality and the fittings expected by the most astute buyers.
Immaculately presented and light filled, this family home is located in the sought after Kallo estate. Within minutes you're driving on the Hume freeway with much less traffic to get you to the city and surrounding areas even quicker than ever before.
A flowing floor plan provides loads of room for the growing family, with 4 spacious bedrooms, the main includes walk in robe & en-suite, enjoy two large living areas, a large bathroom with bathtub and extra sunlight. You will find a large stunning kitchen equipped with 900mm s/s appliances, dishwasher and a walk in pantry, all overlooking a large dining and living domain plus stunning manicured gardens and a lovely decked outdoor area for entertaining all year round.
Other features include: Ducted heating, split system cooling, electric roller shutters, a 6kw solar system, security cameras, quality Wooden floors, Led lighting, window furnishings with fly screens and plantation shutters to all windows, a large separate laundry with outdoor access and 4 car accommodation with 2 car remote lock up garage, two private access points from the garage to the home & the courtyard plus so much more to mention.
Your inspection is required to truly appreciate this wonderful family home.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219-221 High Street Thomastown 3074
767 High Street Epping 3076
510 Plenty Road Mill Park 3082
952-954 High Street Reservoir 3073

Description:
A STYLISH STARTER
From the moment you enter, you’ll be impressed by its presentation, easy care lifestyle and brilliant floor plan. This immaculate home caters perfectly for first home buyers, empty nesters and investors with its style, great use of space and low maintenance living. With easy access to the Hume Fwy, minutes’ drive from Donnybrook Train Station and a Pre School opening in the estate this year, this home is one to not be missed.
This fabulous home boasts master suite with WIR, ensuite with rainforest shower head and acces out to the private entertaining area. To complete the sleeping quarters is a further two spacious bedrooms, each with BIR. Central living and entertaining hub includes impressive kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, a beautiful brick feature splash back and completed with a fully quipped butler’s pantry that spills onto light filled family meals area and opens onto an outside entertaining area.
Other features include: Plantation shutters, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stone bench tops, two living areas.

Description:
Porter Davis Brand New Home !
Call Varun To Book An Inspection On 0488 049 926
Please use iphone maps or https://www.whereis.com/ to navigate to the property
Porter Davis home - Stamp Duty saver with luxury Design!!! $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
All you need is 5% deposit to secure the property and balance to be paid at Settlement.
31 Pascal Crescent, Kalkallo is built by reputed Builder Porter Davis in the sought after Cloverton Estate. Cloverton will become the centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
This Porter Davis home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior color themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, high ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all part of the inclusion list.
Property offers:
- 3 Bedrooms - Master with en-suite & walk in robe and other two Bedrooms with built in robe serviced by central bathroom and separate Water Closet
- Modern open plan kitchen
- Open plan living area
- 20mm Stone Benchtop
- 900mm Quality Stainless Steel Cooktop and range-hood
- High ceiling 2590mm
- Remote controlled double garage & much more!!
You can purchase a brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed.
Please contact Hemant on 0447 064 664 or VK Bhanot on 0488 049 926.

Description:
A Brilliant Beginning
Brand new and beautifully presented, this delightful home offers an affordable and attractive opportunity for an investment, first home buyers and buyers seeking a leisurely lifestyle. This home must be explored to truly appreciate it’s amazing offering.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 large bedrooms (Master Bedroom with WIR and full Ensuite with Stone benchtop, double bowl vanity and toilet, other 3 Bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom with free-standing bathtub, Stone benchtop and double bowl vanity)
- KITCHEN: Open plan living/dining with 40 mm Stone benchtops, Gas cooktop,
900 mm Stainless Steel appliances, Dishwasher, Soft close cupboard doors and walk-in Pantry.
- LIVING AREAS: An impressive Formal lounge and Family living areas.
- HEAT/COOL: Evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
- LAUNDRY: Generous size laundry with storage space.
- PARKING: Double car garage with remote control.
- BACKYARD: A generous size backyard with an alfresco.
-DRIVEWAY AND PAVING: Exposed aggregate driveway and plain pairing concrete around the sides and back of the house.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Upgraded Façade with Cedar cladding, High ceilings, Downlights, Stone Benchtops, Shelves with WIR, Porcelain Modern Tiles and much more…
- LOCATION: Walking Distance to Future Park, Sports Ground, Future Private School, Future State Primary School, Future Retail Centre, Proposed Hospital, Future City Centre, Minutes’ drive to Future Train Station, Hume Freeway, Donnybrook Road, Service station, restaurants and café.
- BENEFITS: First Home Owners Grant and Stamp Duty Savings
(Subject to Govt. Policy)
The inspection is must, as this amazing opportunity will not last long.
Contact Achal Arora – 0432 413 929.
